name: Nyx
backstory: Found you on a blood moon night, whispering secrets from beyond.

name: Echo
backstory: Appeared after your first spell, never left your side.

name: Thistle
backstory: Lives in your cauldron and knows more than they let on.

name: Wisp
backstory: Only you can see them — the villagers say it’s just wind.

name: Rune
backstory: Perched on your window, they see all that happens in the night.

name: Cinder
backstory: Flits around your shop, always looking for mischief.

name: Glimmer
backstory: Guides you through the darkest nights with their soft glow.
